bio:
Elise Swopes is an artist specializing in photography, influencer marketing and graphic design. Born in Minnesota but raised in Chicago, she sees and photographs her hometown with a unique lens - her iPhone. It has become an inspiring proxy for capturing profound skylines and perspectives, mixing reality and fantasy to create dreamy cityscape views.

She began traveling the world taking photos with her iPhone, eventually shooting more professionally with a Canon 5D Mark III and gaining more experience in the business of advertising. Elise has worked with some of the biggest brands in the world including Bud Light, Adobe, Kellogg, Adidas, American Express and many more.
title: Visual Artist specializing in photography, influencer marketing, and graphic design. Known for her unique iPhone photography of cityscapes. She has worked with some of the biggest brands including Bud Light, Adobe, Adidas, and more.
